availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Active Militia Records - Capital Guards, North Cumberland Btn., and Three Forks Btn.
msIdentifier.idno: Box 76, Folder 864-865 1st REGT CAPITAL GUARDS FRANKFORT BATTALION Oaths & Commissions of officers

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND
DIVIDED WE FALL
State of Kentucky
EXECUTIVE DEPARTMENT
Frankfort April 1st 1865

Scott Dudley is hereby appointed Assistant Pay Master of Kentucky, and the Adjutant General will issue his commission as of this day. He will be called into active duty as the demands of the service may require.

Thos E Bramlette
Governor of Ky

Staff apptmt
Dudley Scott
Asst. P. M & Major
issd April 1st 1865
CH
Issue commission as Asst Pay M Genl with rank of Major date 1s April 1865

D. W. Lindsey
Adj Gen Ky
